channel.title: Arts on unwiredcouch.com
channel.description: Recent content in Arts on unwiredcouch.com

item.title: Hot chocolate painting
item.author: d@unwiredcouch.com (Daniel Schauenberg)
item.description: Quick watercolor sketch while watching TV. I tend to focus on people a lot with my art so I wanted to do something different where I’d mostly practice values.
item.content:encoded: Quick watercolor sketch while watching TV. I tend to focus on people a lot with my art so I wanted to do something different where I’d mostly practice values. The reference is from Watercolor Affair but I decided to not follow the tutorial and try out where I’d end up by myself instead.

item.title: Rachel Summers
item.author: d@unwiredcouch.com (Daniel Schauenberg)
item.description: Still feeling inspired by Phil Noto’s art reading the Reign of X storyline.
item.content:encoded: Still feeling inspired by Phil Noto’s art reading the Reign of X storyline. So here’s a TV evening Rachel Summers sketch this time based on a panel in X-Men #16 #art #watercolor #ink #mastoart

item.title: Domino
item.author: d@unwiredcouch.com (Daniel Schauenberg)
item.description: Been a while since I did some art. So tonight in order to study from the best I drew this Domino in ink and watercolor based on a panel in Cable #8 (part of the Reign of X storyline) by Phil Noto.
item.content:encoded: Been a while since I did some art. So tonight in order to study from the best I drew this Domino in ink and watercolor based on a panel in Cable #8 (part of the Reign of X storyline) by Phil Noto.

item.description: not much time for art lately. But I at least took some time for a quick Ramona Flowers (from the Scott Pilgrim comic/movie) sketch with ink and watercolor tonight
item.content:encoded: not much time for art lately. But I at least took some time for a quick Ramona Flowers (from the Scott Pilgrim comic/movie) sketch with ink and watercolor tonight

item.title: Hercule Poirot
item.author: d@unwiredcouch.com (Daniel Schauenberg)
item.description: A quick sketch for this week. Staying with the theme of oldschool TV.
item.content:encoded: A quick sketch for this week. Staying with the theme of oldschool TV. David Suchet as Hercule Poirot in pencil and ink. #art

item.title: Nick Fury from the Secret Invasion TV show
item.author: d@unwiredcouch.com (Daniel Schauenberg)
item.description: I’ve not been making time for art these last couple of months and I’m trying to get back into it.
item.content:encoded: I’ve not been making time for art these last couple of months and I’m trying to get back into it. Feels incredibly rusty but I did a Secret Invasion Nick Fury tonight that I don’t completely hate

item.title: Green Ranger
item.author: d@unwiredcouch.com (Daniel Schauenberg)
item.description: RIP Jason David Frank I very much still remember the emotions those Saturday mornings when the Green Ranger showed up and first wrecked havoc to the Rangers, summoning his Zord with the dagger flute, before finally joining the good side and the Power Rangers to fight evil and eventually becoming the White Ranger.
item.content:encoded:
RIP Jason David Frank

I very much still remember the emotions those Saturday mornings when the Green Ranger showed up and first wrecked havoc to the Rangers, summoning his Zord with the dagger flute, before finally joining the good side and the Power Rangers to fight evil and eventually becoming the White Ranger. I seems a bit silly now writing it all out all these years later. But back then it blew my kid brain and was the main topic of many debates on the school yard. Thanks for everything!

#art #powerrangers #greenranger #jasondavidfrank #watercolor

item.title: MF DOOM
item.author: d@unwiredcouch.com (Daniel Schauenberg)
item.description: MF Doom. Some Friday night art. Watercolor and ink in the sketchbook.
item.content:encoded: MF Doom. Some Friday night art. Watercolor and ink in the sketchbook.

item.title: Kate
item.author: d@unwiredcouch.com (Daniel Schauenberg)
item.description: I watched “Kate” with Mary Elizabeth Winstead and while I usually don’t enjoy gory movies too much I enjoyed that one a lot.
item.content:encoded:
I watched “Kate” with Mary Elizabeth Winstead and while I usually don’t enjoy gory movies too much I enjoyed that one a lot. Lots of good fight scenes and the general atmosphere was pretty cool.

#art #sketch #sketchbook #watercolor #ink #movies #kate #instaart

item.title: Splinter
item.author: d@unwiredcouch.com (Daniel Schauenberg)
item.description: dramatic Splinter I would definitely watch a TMNT show about a younger Splinter pre-Turtles that just runs around a does badass ninja stuff.
item.content:encoded:
dramatic Splinter

I would definitely watch a TMNT show about a younger Splinter pre-Turtles that just runs around a does badass ninja stuff. Got inspired for this by the recent absolutely amazing @bosslogic Metal Gear Solid cyborg ninja posts for the MGS anniversary. And thought which other popular fighters would fit such a pose.

#art #sketch #sketchbook #ink #watercolor #splinter #tmnt #turtles #instaart #comicart

item.title: The One Who Remains
item.author: d@unwiredcouch.com (Daniel Schauenberg)
item.description: Pretty excited for this dude to show up and show some Avengers what’s up.
item.content:encoded:
Pretty excited for this dude to show up and show some Avengers what’s up. I started the sketch while watching Loki season 1 and finally took the time to finish it

#art #sketch #sketchbook #comicart #kang #avengers #marvel #watercolor #ink

item.title: Conan and Tetra
item.author: d@unwiredcouch.com (Daniel Schauenberg)
item.description: I gave sketching my version of a Conan panel from the one book I had as a kid a try.
item.content:encoded:
I gave sketching my version of a Conan panel from the one book I had as a kid a try. Swipe to see the original and the cover of the book. It was the only Conan book I had as a kid but I devoured it and was fascinated by the stories. So I wanted to see how it would look like if I gave it a try. I took some inspiration for Conan from @mahmudasrar’s version (his art is amazing and a constant inspiration for me to get better) but tried to still stay close to the original.

#art #sketch #sketchbook #comicart #watercolor #conan #conanthebarbarian

item.description: Couldn’t not give this a try. The first episode of the Moon Knight show was so good.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Dinosaur
item.author: d@unwiredcouch.com (Daniel Schauenberg)
item.description: I rarely draw animals, let alone extinct ones. But this was a ton of fun and a good learning exercise.
item.content:encoded:
I rarely draw animals, let alone extinct ones. But this was a ton of fun and a good learning exercise.

#drawing #painting #art #watercolor #sketch #sketchbook #dinosaur #triceratops #tonedpaper #ink #instaart

item.title: Dr. Beverly Crusher
item.author: d@unwiredcouch.com (Daniel Schauenberg)
item.description: Dr. Beverly Crusher, Star Trek TNG. It’s been hard to find time for art lately.
item.content:encoded: Dr. Beverly Crusher, Star Trek TNG. It’s been hard to find time for art lately. And the more I don’t do it the more I stress myself about having to make something really good to make it count. So today I just took my art supplies while watching TV and decided to see what happens. And I don’t hate it 😬. . . #art #sketch #sketchbook #drawing #painting #watercolor #strathmore #fabercastell #watercolorpencils #ink #startrek #beverlycrusher #tng #tvshow #tv #instaart

item.title: Columbo
item.author: d@unwiredcouch.com (Daniel Schauenberg)
item.description: Columbo. This started as a traditional quick sketch on paper while watching TV.
item.content:encoded: Columbo. This started as a traditional quick sketch on paper while watching TV. And then I was too lazy to get my watercolors and colored this in procreate with mostly the watercolor brush. I generally have a hard time with creating digital art (I just enjoy traditional more). But this approach inspired by @schmoedraws’ process she shared on her Patreon really worked for me. . . #art #sketch #painting #procreate #digitalart #columbo #peterfalk #tv #watercolor #instaart

item.title: Lebron James
item.author: d@unwiredcouch.com (Daniel Schauenberg)
item.description: LeBron James sketch. Pencil on toned paper. This started as a loose underdrawing for a painting.
item.content:encoded:
LeBron James sketch. Pencil on toned paper. This started as a loose underdrawing for a painting. Then I decided to tighten the pencils a bit more and now I don’t know anymore if I want to paint over it 😂. .

But still decided to color it a couple of days later. Watercolor and watercolor pencils. And a little bit of ink for some small details. That counts for #inktober, right? 😆 . . . #art #sketch #sketchbook #drawing #painting #watercolor #watercolorpainting #watercolorpencils #ink #markers #lebronjames #basketball #🏀 #👑 #tonedpaper #fabercastell #strathmorepaper #royaltalens #instaart

item.title: Adrianne Sloboh
item.author: d@unwiredcouch.com (Daniel Schauenberg)
item.description: watercolor practice with the new @etchr_lab brushes. Trying to capture some of that mesmerizing magic of an @adrianne.
item.content:encoded: watercolor practice with the new @etchr_lab brushes. Trying to capture some of that mesmerizing magic of an @adrianne.sloboh flip. Still so much to learn but I really enjoyed painting this one and the brushes are really nice. . . #art #sketch #sketchbook #watercolor #painting #drawing #artstudy #practice #skateboard #kickflip #tonedpaper #etchrlab #fabercastell #royaltalens #instaartist #instaart

item.title: Spider-Man 2018 vs. 2020
item.author: d@unwiredcouch.com (Daniel Schauenberg)
item.description: 2018 vs 2020. To the week 2 years ago I decided that I wanted to learn how to draw with basically no idea how to do it.
item.content:encoded:
2018 vs 2020. To the week 2 years ago I decided that I wanted to learn how to draw with basically no idea how to do it. I watched a ton of @jimlee stream videos on YouTube and in that first week I drew the bottom Spider-Man sketch and it took me about 3 hours. Since then art has become such a big part of my life and one of the most joyful hobbies I’ve ever had. I’ve tried out so many mediums, discovered artists and their wonderful art, and learned to appreciate comic books in a completely new way. I decided to redraw the sketch how I would do it today (and in about an hour). It’s too easy to think I’ve not learned anything in the last 2 years when drawings don’t turn out the way I want. But this exercise really made me realize how far I’ve come, even if I know how far I still want to go.

#art #drawing #sketch #sketching #pencil #ink #spiderman #marvel #comicart #instaart #learntodraw #study

item.title: Roidrage
item.author: d@unwiredcouch.com (Daniel Schauenberg)
item.description: Because art should be fun here’s a hyper realist painting of @roidrage in celebration of his recent forays into woodworking and the forest.
item.content:encoded:
Because art should be fun here’s a hyper realist painting of @roidrage in celebration of his recent forays into woodworking and the forest. Also I never thought „shirtless lumberjack“ would end up in my search history. Done in watercolor and gouache on Clairefontaine mixed media paper.

#art #painting #sketch #watercolor #gouache #woodworking #lumberjack #axe #instaart

item.content:encoded:

item.title: Abby
item.author: d@unwiredcouch.com (Daniel Schauenberg)
item.description: Abby from Last of Us 2. I don’t think I have the nerves to actually play it.
item.content:encoded:
Abby from Last of Us 2. I don’t think I have the nerves to actually play it. But all the cool art happening around this game is really incredible. These are some fountain pen and white watercolor pencil sketches done while watching TV.

#art #sketch #sketchbook #fountainpen #ink #watercolorpencils #tonedpaper #strathmorepaper #abby #lastofus2 #videogames #videogameart #instaart #drawing #sketching

item.title: Bridgeman study
item.author: d@unwiredcouch.com (Daniel Schauenberg)
item.description: Anatomy studies after George Bridgman. I’ve been watching the @stevehustonartist course on sketchbooking on @newmastersacademy and was immediately hooked.
item.content:encoded:
Anatomy studies after George Bridgman. I’ve been watching the @stevehustonartist course on sketchbooking on @newmastersacademy and was immediately hooked. I got a scrapbook and filled my @lamy_official joy with bronze ink. And it’s been very enjoyable to just experiment and learn and worry less about feeling like I need to “finish” something.

#art #sketchbook #sketching #anatomy #lamy #lamyjoy #fountainpen #instaart
